heading: HB02208
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFIT TO BE PROVIDED BY THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8282 ENTITLED 'AN ACT FURTHER STRENGTHENING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM THEREBY AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 1161, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE SOCIAL SECURITY LAW' AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02208
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFIT TO BE PROVIDED BY THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8282 ENTITLED 'AN ACT FURTHER STRENGTHENING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM THEREBY AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 1161, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE SOCIAL SECURITY LAW' AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA
DATE FILED : 2016-08-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bertiz (020 2016-09-07)2. Tambunting (071 2017-02-15)
3. Silverio (024 2017-09-13)4. Olivarez (000 2018-09-04)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated by the TWG on 2016-10-19
          -SSS expressed support for the measure, but said it may be offered to members willing to pay additional premium for such service
          -TWG on measures proposing amendments to both SSS and GSIS, chaired by Rep. Mariño
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-08-08
